meta.title: NEON THIRTEEN : PERSEPHONE RUN
meta.theme: Cyberpunk, megacorps, terminal aesthetics, rugged streets.

short.description: Fast track (6–9 choices). Minimal detours, quick resolution.

long.description: Full run (12–18 choices). More branching, more reactivity.

webTieIn.blogTitle: my little corner of the internet
webTieIn.summary: In-universe, Alex’s 2077-08-13 post on jndl.dev doubles as a dead drop. The terminal-style homepage hides commands hinted at in the story.

hiddenCommands.discoverHint: References to seeds, spring, and the name 'Kore' (Persephone).
hiddenCommands.effect: Reveals an ARG panel and decrypts steganographic payload if the post was weaponized.
Prints the 2077-08-13 post metadata and a subtle checksum clue.

nodes.text:
Choose your run length.
• Short: quick operation, direct routes, fewer detours.
• Long: richer routes, more consequences.

choices.text: SHORT RUN (6–9 choices)
LONG RUN (12–18 choices)

nodes.text: Neon rain taps your window in District Black. 02:13, Friday the 13th, 2077-08-13. A cracked holo: "Nine, it’s Gotara. Vault Night. Acheron opens for two hours. Ghost Key’s inside. Alex scheduled a harmless post on jndl.dev today—we can ride it."

choices.text: Answer: "Patch me in. Prime the Persephone template."
Ignore the call; hit Rust Harbor bar for chatter.
Trace the ping yourself through an old backbone.
SHORT-RUN: "Skip chatter. Move on the vault plan now."

nodes.text: Gotara: "Plan is breach, snatch Ghost Key, exfil via the jndl.dev blog—title’s 'my little corner of the internet'. Clean by default unless we flip the payload."

choices.text: Accept the job and prep the blog payload.
Demand an advance for risk.
Delay; collect street intel first.

nodes.text: Gotara sighs. "Fine. Don’t get flashy. Persephone deploy is standing by."

choices.text: Move on the vault plan.

nodes.text: Rust Harbor breathes ozone and noodles. Bartender Juno nods. Two Acheron Enforcers scan faces.

choices.text: Hide in the kitchen cold-void; spoof face-heat.
Chat up the Enforcers like you belong.
Slip Juno a data chit: "Any talk about Vault Night?"

nodes.text: Your trace hooks an ancient Acheron filament. An entity blinks: {Mother-of-Needles}. "Little spider, why tug my silk on a Thirteenth?"

choices.text: Bargain: "Help me reach the vault, I’ll seed you through a public blog."
Attack the sentinel AI head-on.
Retreat and ring Gotara.

nodes.text: Counter-intrusion singes your cortex. Static crawls down your spine.

choices.text: Cut the link; go analog with a physical infiltration.

nodes.text: Breach planning. Acheron Tower hums like a tuning fork. Window opens in 47 minutes. Persephone deploy queue waits with Alex’s 2077-08-13 post on jndl.dev.

choices.text: Rooftop approach via monorail spine and zipline.
Front door with forged pass and deadpan corporate stare.
Sewer drone run: remote-hack sub-basement ports.
SHORT-RUN: ride the maintenance clock straight to the vault.

nodes.text: Cold-void hums. You splice a skin-temp masker. Enforcers pass by.

choices.text: Leave quietly and head to the tower.

nodes.text: Enforcer: "Badge?" Your blank blinks green. He smirks. "We could use talent like you. Side contract?"

choices.text: Sign the side contract.
Feign interest, then slip toward security hub.
Refuse bluntly; make a scene.

nodes.text: Eyes track you. A drone blinks red.

choices.text: Run for the service stairs.

nodes.text: Juno loads your chit. "Rumor says Ghost Key maps black sites. If you can prove it, I’ll blast it citywide. Use that nerd’s blog as cover—jndl.dev, right?"

choices.text: Promise proof; prep the Persephone payload.

nodes.text: Mother-of-Needles purrs: "Bring me spring in winter; six seeds for six months. Whisper 'Kore' to the machine and it will answer."

choices.text: Accept the glyph; let the AI ride shotgun.
Decline and go meatspace instead.

nodes.text: Wind claws the monorail spine. The tower’s halo flickers 13 times. A maintenance drone trundles by.

choices.text: Fast-line zip. Beat the schedule.
Shadow the drone and enter via hatch G-13.

nodes.text: In the sewers, your drone sniffs a fiber trunk. Vault window opens in 9 minutes.

choices.text: Overclock and burn through ice.
Spoof housekeeping packets; stay quiet.

nodes.text: Acheron orientation. Handler: "Deliver the Ghost Key to us and you’re made. We’ll even sanitize that blog stunt."

choices.text: Nod along; plan a double-cross.
Mean it. Become their blade.

nodes.text: Security hub: glass, chrome, too many cameras. A cell block blinks OCCUPIED.

choices.text: Free the detainees as chaos cover.
Neutralize alarms; clean entry to the vault.
Plant a corporate beacon to curry favor.

nodes.text: Shackles fall. A chorus of thanks floods your comm. A prisoner slips you a shard: "Evidence."

choices.text: Take the shard and sprint to the vault.

nodes.text: Cameras loop. Lifts unlock. Your window is now.

choices.text: Descend to the vault.

nodes.text: The vault yawns like a cathedral. In the core, a crystal of code: the Ghost Key pulses 13 beats. A mural shows a crown of spring and a split fruit.

choices.text: Pocket the Ghost Key.
Slot a sliver of the Key into your cortex.
Smash the Key and grab the raw logs instead.

nodes.text: Alarms cough awake. Extraction pathways flicker in your HUD. Alex’s 2077-08-13 Persephone post on jndl.dev is queued—clean by default, weaponized if you inject the payload.

choices.text: Inject payload into the blog post and publish NOW.
Publish the blog clean as a harmless decoy.
SHORT-RUN: auto-inject and publish via jndl.dev (one-tap).
Skip the blog; go dark and flee.
Fight your way out, guns-up.

nodes.text: The post goes live on jndl.dev: *my little corner of the internet*—a friendly intro about projects and work. No payload. Enforcers still swarm.

choices.text: Use the decoy’s traffic spike to slip out.
Change your mind: flip the payload live mid-flight.

nodes.text: City screens blink. The blog’s body carries steganographic shards: black budgets, ghost prisons, callsigns. A footer easter-egg appears on jndl.dev’s terminal: try `persephone --bloom` (or just type `pomegranate`).

choices.text: Stay and protect the broadcast to the last packet.
Trust the automation; slip away in the chaos.

nodes.text: Executive elevator. Handler: "Wise choice. Sign here, become no one and everyone. We’ll keep that blog of yours clean."

choices.text: Sign. Become their ghost.
Double-cross: trigger a purge, then vanish into the noise.
SHORT-RUN: call the emergency corp hotline and sell out.

nodes.text: Rooftop in acid rain. The Ghost Key hums in your skull. It whispers: "Merge, and end the loneliness." Far below, a humble blog glows on jndl.dev.

choices.text: Refuse the whisper. Live with the burden.
Offer the Key to Gotara; split the risk.
Step off the edge and let the city swallow the noise.
Accept the merge: let Ghost Key overwrite you.

nodes.text: You choose the long road. The post—clean or weaponized—becomes part of the city’s rumor-spine.

choices.text: If the blog carried the payload, lean into the moment.
If the blog was clean, seed the truth by hand—slower, safer.
If you never posted, vanish and work the underground.

nodes.text: Corridors bloom with muzzle flash. Acheron deploys a black-team with ceramic wings.

choices.text: Use freed citizens’ riot as cover.
Call in your corporate favor for extraction.
Stand and trade fire until the mag clicks dry.
SHORT-RUN: trigger auto-suppressors and sprint (coin flip).

nodes.title: SELF-ERASE
nodes.text: You choose silence—whether a final step into rain or surrender to the Key’s cold embrace. Nine dissolves into static. On 2077-08-13, a small post on jndl.dev remains: a gentle hello that once carried the weight of a city.

nodes.title: CLEANUP
nodes.text: Acheron’s black-team closes the book with clinical precision. Your last sight is a sky of iron birds. Somewhere, the blog refreshes—clean, innocuous, the perfect obituary the corp will never read.

nodes.title: SIGNAL BLOOM
nodes.text: The truth spills—fast if you weaponized the blog, slow if you played it safe. Protests ignite. Some cells open. Some don’t. You survive—scarred, watching a terminal prompt on jndl.dev become an annual touchstone: people type `persephone --bloom` and remember.

nodes.title: EXECUTIVE GHOST
nodes.text: You sign with a smile that doesn’t reach your eyes. Perks. Clearance. A new face. The 2077-08-13 post stays scrubbed and friendly while you become the shadow that keeps the machine humming for the next Thirteenth.
